subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Advertising and Marketing
Running
lead_paragraph: Every runner of the New York City Marathon receives a goody bag upon registration pickup, which leaves the task of  assembling 40,000 plastic bags full of coupons, brochures and free samples of deodorant.
